description: Header file defining the OmiProxy class, which implements the IOmiProxy interface for managing crypted bundles and listeners in an OCI Container context.

classes.name: OmiProxy
classes.description: A class implementing IOmiProxy interface, providing methods for mounting, unmounting, and listener management related to encrypted bundles in OCI Containers.

methods.name: bool mountCryptedBundle(const std::string & id,const std::string & rootfs_file_path,const std::string & config_json_path,std::string & bundlePath)
methods.description: Method to mount a crypted bundle with specified identifiers and configuration paths, returns success status.

methods.name: bool umountCryptedBundle(const std::string & id)
methods.description: Method to unmount a crypted bundle based on its identifier.

methods.name: long unsigned registerListener(const OmiErrorListener & listener,const void * cbParams)
methods.description: Registers an error listener with associated callback parameters, returns a registration tag.

methods.name: void unregisterListener(long unsigned tag)
methods.description: Unregisters an error listener using its registration tag.

ctags.name: mountCryptedBundle
ctags.signature: (const std::string & id,const std::string & rootfs_file_path,const std::string & config_json_path,std::string & bundlePath)

ctags.name: registerListener
ctags.pattern: /^    virtual long unsigned registerListener(const OmiErrorListener &listener, const void* cbParam/

ctags.name: umountCryptedBundle
ctags.pattern: /^    virtual bool umountCryptedBundle(const std::string& id) { return true; }$/
